doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes materials from artists, including, among others, Wolfgang Laib, Helmut Lang, Jacob Lawrence, An-My Le, Richard Learoyd, Charles Ledray, Sandra Lerner, Sherrie Levine, Alain Licari, Roy Lichtenstein, Maya Lin, James Little, Richard Long, Andrew Lord, Tim Lovejoy, Whitfield Lovell, and David Lynch. Also includes a fold-out board on the exhibition, "Michael Landy: Breaking News - New York." Includes a poster from the exhibition, "Norman Lewis: Looking East." Also includes a pamphlet from the International Center of Photography, "Alexander Liberman: The Artist in his Studio." Includes a pamphlet on the Artist, Emil Lukas, in connection with an exhibition of his works held at the Sperone Westwater Gallery.
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> L (Set 2)
